strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday NWA! Here are some of the happenings this weekend:

  • Old fashioned: Get your vintage on at the Vintage Days Market this weekend!
  • Jump: The 32nd Annual Pea Ridge Mule Jump is this Saturday.
  • Guten Tag: It's time for lederhosen, beer, and German food at the Oktoberfest in Downtown Rogers.
  • Classic fun: Calling all 5th-9th graders to dress up and get down at a free retro themed party at Crystal Bridges.
  • Eclectic: The ArkanSalsa Fest is this weekend, raising money for scholarships and community leaders.
  • Camp out: Hillberry the Harvest Moon Festival is all weekend in Eureka Springs.
  • Little bikes: Go watch the Pedal Kids race this Saturday at Buddy Pegs HQ.
  • Dress for the occasion: Grab some friends and head downtown, because it's Ghouls Night Out in Springdale tonight.

Tally ho! See ya Monday!
